definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: There was silence as the elegant stomach specialist stood up.
sentences.chinese: 那位溫文儒雅的胃病專家起立時室內一片寂靜。

sentences.english: Elbows have no tendency to turn in or out when standing or gaiting .
sentences.chinese: 站立時或行走中，肘部沒有向內彎或向外翻的跡象。

sentences.english: A basic fireworks safety rule is to remain standing when using sparklers.
sentences.chinese: 煙花爆竹安全的一個基本規則是站立時，使用煙火。

sentences.english: Your shoulders would remain behind your knees while you bend the knees to lift.
sentences.chinese: 您需維持上身的姿勢與站立時一樣，只是結束時彎膝。

sentences.english: And whoso falleth not down and worshippeth shall the same hour be cast into the midst of a burning fiery furnace.
sentences.chinese: 凡不俯伏敬拜的，必立時扔在烈火的窯中。

sentences.english: Since established, the psycho-analysis emphasizes the importance of experience of early child.
sentences.chinese: 從創立時起，精神分析就強調兒童早期經驗的重要性。

sentences.english: The rear pastern ( metatarsus ) is of medium length and perpendicular to the ground as the dog stands naturally.
sentences.chinese: 後腳腕長度中等，當狗自然站立時，垂直於地面。

sentences.english: During the winter, the spray from the falls immediately turns into icy pearls.
sentences.chinese: 冬日裏，瀑布的飛沫立時變成了結冰的珍珠。

sentences.english: A dropped tail while standing is not to be penalized.
sentences.chinese: 站立時，尾巴向後拋，不屬於缺陷。

sentences.english: On the five percent of the total amount of capitals at the time of establishment.
sentences.chinese: 一創立時就其資本總額提撥百分之一至百分之五。

sentences.english: Article 57 A civil juristic act shall be legally binding once it is instituted.
sentences.chinese: 第五十七條民事法律行爲從成立時起具有法律約束力。

sentences.english: Was Sun Quan the emperor of the State of Wu during the Three Kingdom Period?
sentences.chinese: 那麼孫權就是三國鼎立時的吳國皇帝是嗎？

sentences.english: Legume cover crops must be planted, when new plantations are established.
sentences.chinese: 在新種植園建立時必須種植豆科保護作物。

sentences.english: Times have changed since our beginning in 1978.
sentences.chinese: 自哈納成立時的1978年以來，時代已發生了改變。

sentences.english: The market is declining! we recommend your immedidined contentment.
sentences.chinese: 市場在萎縮，我們創議你方立時接受。

sentences.english: Pleottom quote us when you receive our inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 請接到我們的詢價單後立時給我們報價。

definition: car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
